fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • This Life can be streamed on BritBox, not BBC iPlayer as a feature on TV shows to binge-watch said. In addition, Happy Valley is set in West Yorkshire, not North Yorkshire (Home comforts, 19 March, page 2, G2). • The coffee shop chain Pret a Manger has 8,000 staff, not 12,000 as figures supplied to us led an article to say (Pret slashes workers’ wages and hours for three months, 20 March, page 33). • Other recently amended articles include: Coronavirus: why are UK schools closing and what does it mean for parents? Is the UK government moving fast enough on coronavirus? The French are finally observing lockdown advice – but is it too late? Have dog actors had their last on-screen bark? Rob Brydon and Steve Coogan: ‘Work-wise, Steve’s terrific. On a personal level, appalling’ Under the Tories, expertise has been replaced by a phoney test of patriotism The small Dutch town that wants to shape the future of your food
